responses.rationale: The intensifier 'highly' directly modifies the risk-adjective 'susceptible'.
The segment contains negative facts ('deaths') and quantities ('only 334') but no intensifier modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment describes a factual situation ('one-off', 'no close contacts sick') but lacks an intensifier modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses positive framing ('gold standard', 'safe and healthy') but no intensifier modifying a risk-adjective.
